branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled - Basic Type
branchCategory.description: <p>Rodless cylinder, magnetically coupled series CY basic type can be used in many diverse environments. Magnetically coupled cylinders have a wide range of applications, and save mounting space.&nbsp;</p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled - Basic Type

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, CY3B, Magnetically Coupled (mm Stroke) - Basic Type
branchItem.description: <p>The CY3B Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled uses industrial strength magnets located in the piston and external carriage to form a single unit that will travel when actuated with air pressure.  The CY3B series has resin based lube retainers installed on the dust seal to more evenly distribute lubricant for a reduction in minimum operating pressure. 70% longer wear rings will distribute a side load over a larger contact area for improved bearing performance.  <span style="color: #ff0000;">Please note the CY3B must be used with an external guide to support the load.</span></p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, NCY3B - Magnetically Coupled (Inch Stroke) - Basic Type
branchItem.description: <p>The NCY3B Rodless Cylinder - Magnetically Coupled uses industrial strength magnets located in the piston and external carriage to form a single unit that will travel when actuated with air pressure.  The NCY3B series has resin based lube retainers installed on the dust seal to more evenly distribute lubricant for a reduction in minimum operating pressure.  70% longer wear rings will distribute a side load over a larger contact area for improved bearing performance.  <span style="color: #ff0000;">Please note the NCY3B must be used with an external guide to support the load.</span></p>
